original_text: Now that which was prepared for me daily was one ox and six choice sheep; also fowls were prepared for me, and once in ten days store of all sorts of wine: yet for all this required not I the bread of the governor, because the bondage was heavy upon this people.
korean_text: 매일 나를 위하여 소 한 마리와 살진 양 여섯 마리를 준비하며 닭도 많이 준비하고 열흘에 한 번씩은 각종 포도주를 갖추었나니 비록 이같이 하였을지라도 내가 총독의 녹을 요구하지 아니하였음은 이 백성의 부역이 중함이었더라

sentences.original_text: Now that which was prepared for me daily
was one ox and six choice sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 황소 한 마리와 선택된 양 여섯 마리였으며

sentences.original_text: also fowls were prepared for me
store of all sorts of wine
required not I the bread of the governor
because the bondage was heavy upon this people
